title: parama puruSan
sahitya:
parama puruSan pada dhyAnam 9shrI) sheidAl paramapadam peralAm anudinam


anupallavi

  oru deivamuNDu avanaruL nizhalil arashanum ANDiyum onrE shIR mighum


caraNam    mAyA prapancam tIya poi vanjam valiya izhuttu shellum nam nenjam
 tIyOr sangam viDuttu sat-sangam shErvadu arivinukkangam shrI
